list.title: module:Controller
list.description: A module to handle command-line interface commands.

list.title: module:Util.batches
list.description: A function to read the contents of a directory and to extract all files with the file extension *.json.

list.title: module:Util.isDir
list.description: A function to check whether a path is a directory. This is a wrapper function for fs.lstatSync(path).isDirectory().

list.title: module:Util.path
list.description: A function to check whether an absolute or relative path exists.
